column4: why? why? why _only_ RAW blank CD-RW disc works?! it cannot be erased! i've tried gnomebaker, k3b & natuilus; nothing cannot be erased. :-(
is this command correct? cdrecord blank=fast dev=/dev/hdc
oy. it doesn't work. cannot blank disc, aborted. *sigh* thanks for the hint.
it's supposed to be slightly faster, but I don't know if it is usefully quicker.  you can try it and see...
it's not buggy in general, just on some hardware...
ur right. i didn't add to it. :)
hoary is a stable release. stable = doesn't change
alright, whatever. i still think it should be merged into hoary repos when it is stable. :P
that would be silly and pointless work
that effort would be wasted, when it could go into just making breezy better
